verses.verse: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> that [were] with him rose up early יְרֻבַּ֜עַל <WH3378> Then Jerubbaal ה֣וּא <WH1931> he גִדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> who [is] Gideon וְכָל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched עַל־ <WH5921> beside עֵ֣ין חֲרֹ֑ד <WH5878> beside the well of Harod וּמַחֲנֵ֤ה <WH4264> so that the host מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> of the Midianites הָיָה־ <WH1961> become ל֣וֹ מִצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> were on the north side מִגִּבְעַ֥ת <WH1389> of them by the hill הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <WH4176> of Moreh בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> in the valley

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> unto Gideon רַ֗ב <WH7227> that [are] with thee [are] too many הָעָם֙ <WH5971> The people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> for מִתִּתִּ֥י <WH5414> for me to give אֶת־ <WH853> מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> the Midianites בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> into their hands פֶּן־ <WH6435> would יִתְפָּאֵ֨ר <WH6286> vaunt עָלַ֤י <WH5921> for יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> lest Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> themselves against me saying יָדִ֖י <WH3027> Mine own hand הוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <WH3467> hath saved לִּֽי׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> henceforth קְרָ֨א <WH7121> proclaim נָ֜א <WH4994> Now therefore go to בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <WH241> in the ears הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מִֽי־ <WH4310> any יָרֵ֣א <WH3373> Whosoever [is] fearful וְחָרֵ֔ד <WH2730> and afraid יָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> let him return וְיִצְפֹּ֖ר <WH6852> and depart early מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> from mount הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> And there returned מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of the people עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand נִשְׁאָֽרוּ׃ <WH7604> and there remained ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> unto Gideon עוֹד֮ <WH5750> are still הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> The people רָב֒ <WH7227> [are] yet [too] many הוֹרֵ֤ד <WH3381> bring them down אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> unto the water וְאֶצְרְפֶ֥נּוּ <WH6884> and I will try לְךָ֖ שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> become אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> of whom אֹמַ֨ר <WH559> them for thee there and it shall be [that] of whom I say אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> to you זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> This יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> shall go אִתָּ֗ךְ <WH854> for ה֚וּא <WH1931> he יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> shall go אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> but וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of whom אֹמַ֜ר <WH559> with thee and of whomsoever I say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> about זֶ֚ה <WH2088> one לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go

וַיּ֥וֹרֶד <WH3381> So he brought down אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> unto the water ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> unto Gideon כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָלֹק֩ <WH3952> Every one that lappeth בִּלְשׁוֹנ֨וֹ <WH3956> with his tongue מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמַּ֜יִם <WH4325> of the water כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who יָלֹ֣ק <WH3952> lappeth הַכֶּ֗לֶב <WH3611> as a dog תַּצִּ֤יג <WH3322> him shalt thou set אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> לְבָ֔ד <WH905> shall separate וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִכְרַ֥ע <WH3766> by himself likewise every one that boweth down עַל־ <WH5921> upon בִּרְכָּ֖יו <WH1290> upon his knees לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> to drink

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become מִסְפַּ֞ר <WH4557> And the number הַֽמֲלַקְקִ֤ים <WH3952> of them that lapped בְּיָדָם֙ <WH3027> [putting] their hand אֶל־ <WH413> to פִּיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> to their mouth שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> were three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> but all the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people כָּרְע֥וּ <WH3766> bowed down עַל־ <WH5921> upon בִּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1290> upon their knees לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <WH8354> to drink מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> unto גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> unto Gideon בִּשְׁלֹשׁ֩ <WH7969> By the three מֵא֨וֹת <WH3967> hundred הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> men הַֽמֲלַקְקִים֙ <WH3952> that lapped אוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> will I save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> you and deliver אֶת־ <WH853> מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> the Midianites בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> into thine hand וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and let all the [other] people יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> go אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> unto his place

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> took אֶת־ <WH853> צֵדָה֩ <WH6720> victuals הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> So the people בְּיָדָ֜ם <WH3027> in their hand וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> שׁוֹפְרֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH7782> and their trumpets וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> [the rest of] Israel שִׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> and he sent אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְאֹֽהָלָ֔יו <WH168> unto his tent וּבִשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> those three מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men הֶֽחֱזִ֑יק <WH2388> and retained וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> and the host מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> of Midian הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> was beneath him in the valley פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> And it came to pass the same night הַה֔וּא <WH1931> now the same וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD ק֖וּם <WH6965> unto him Arise רֵ֣ד <WH3381> get thee down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> unto the host כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נְתַתִּ֖יו <WH5414> for I have delivered בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> it into thine hand

וְאִם־ <WH518> if יָרֵ֥א <WH3373> But if thou fear אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לָרֶ֑דֶת <WH3381> to go down רֵ֥ד <WH3381> down אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you וּפֻרָ֥ה <WH6513> thou with Phurah נַעַרְךָ֖ <WH5288> thy servant אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> to the host

וְשָֽׁמַעְתָּ֙ <WH8085> And thou shalt hear מַה־ <WH4100> what יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> what they say וְאַחַר֙ <WH310> and afterward תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <WH2388> be strengthened יָדֶ֔יךָ <WH3027> shall thine hands וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <WH3381> to go down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> unto the host וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> Then went he down הוּא֙ <WH1931> he וּפֻרָ֣ה <WH6513> with Phurah נַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> his servant אֶל־ <WH413> to קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> unto the outside הַחֲמֻשִׁ֖ים <WH2571> of the armed men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that was בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> that [were] in the host

וּמִדְיָ֨ן <WH4080> And the Midianites וַעֲמָלֵ֤ק <WH6002> and the Amalekites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> and all the children קֶ֙דֶם֙ <WH6924> of the east נֹפְלִ֣ים <WH5307> lay בָּעֵ֔מֶק <WH6010> along in the valley כָּאַרְבֶּ֖ה <WH697> like grasshoppers לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> for multitude וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶם֙ <WH1581> and their camels אֵ֣ין <WH369> were without מִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> [were] without number כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> as the sand שֶׁעַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> side הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> by the sea לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> was come גִדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> And when Gideon וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> behold אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> behold [there was] a man מְסַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> that told לְרֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> unto his fellow חֲל֑וֹם <WH2472> a dream וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> Behold חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> a dream חָלַ֗מְתִּי <WH2492> Behold I dreamed וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold [צְלֹול כ] (צְלִ֜יל <WH6742> cake ק) לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> bread שְׂעֹרִים֙ <WH8184> of barley מִתְהַפֵּךְ֙ <WH2015> tumbled בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> into the host מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> of Midian וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> against הָ֠אֹהֶל <WH168> unto a tent וַיַּכֵּ֧הוּ <WH5221> and smote וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <WH5307> it that it fell וַיַּהַפְכֵ֥הוּ <WH2015> and turned לְמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> upside וְנָפַ֥ל <WH5307> lay along הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> it that the tent

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered רֵעֵ֤הוּ <WH7453> And his fellow וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֵ֣ין <WH369> is nothing זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise בִּלְתִּ֗י <WH1115> because אִם־ <WH518> lo חֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> This [is] nothing else save the sword גִּדְע֥וֹן <WH1439> of Gideon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> a man יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> delivered הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> hath God בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> [for] into his hand אֶת־ <WH853> מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> Midian וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> and all the host פ

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard גִּדְע֜וֹן <WH1439> And it was [so] when Gideon אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְפַּ֧ר <WH4557> the telling הַחֲל֛וֹם <WH2472> of the dream וְאֶת־ <WH853> שִׁבְר֖וֹ <WH7667> and the interpretation וַיִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <WH7812> thereof that he worshipped וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> and returned אֶל־ <WH413> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> into the host יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ק֔וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> for the LORD בְּיֶדְכֶ֖ם <WH3027> into your hand אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> the host מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian

וַיַּ֛חַץ <WH2673> And he divided אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> the three מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> [into] three רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7218> companies וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and he put שׁוֹפָר֤וֹת <WH7782> a trumpet בְּיַד־ <WH3027> in every man's hand כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> of all וְכַדִּ֣ים <WH3537> pitchers רֵקִ֔ים <WH7386> with empty וְלַפִּדִ֖ים <WH3940> and lamps בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> within הַכַּדִּֽים׃ <WH3537> the pitchers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about מִמֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> to them תִרְא֖וּ <WH7200> unto them Look וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> likewise תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> on me and do וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I בָא֙ <WH935> likewise and behold when I come בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> to the outside הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> of the camp וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become כַאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> it shall be [that] as I do כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> likewise תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> so shall ye do

וְתָקַעְתִּי֙ <WH8628> When I blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> with a trumpet אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתִּ֑י <WH854> for וּתְקַעְתֶּ֨ם <WH8628> I and all that [are] with me then blow בַּשּׁוֹפָר֜וֹת <WH7782> ye the trumpets גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you סְבִיבוֹת֙ <WH5439> also on every side כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> of all the camp וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> and say לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [The sword] of the LORD וּלְגִדְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1439> and of Gideon פ

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> that [were] with him came גִ֠דְעוֹן <WH1439> So Gideon וּמֵאָה־ <WH3967> and the hundred אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֜וֹ <WH854> for בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> unto the outside הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <WH4264> of the camp רֹ֚אשׁ <WH7218> in the beginning הָאַשְׁמֹ֣רֶת <WH821> watch הַתִּֽיכוֹנָ֔ה <WH8484> of the middle אַ֛ךְ <WH389> and they had but הָקֵ֥ם <WH6965> newly הֵקִ֖ימוּ <WH6965> set אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֹּֽׁמְרִ֑ים <WH8104> the watch וַֽיִּתְקְעוּ֙ <WH8628> and they blew בַּשּׁ֣וֹפָר֔וֹת <WH7782> the trumpets וְנָפ֥וֹץ <WH5310> and brake הַכַּדִּ֖ים <WH3537> the pitchers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּיָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> that [were] in their hands

וַֽ֠יִּתְקְעוּ <WH8628> blew שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> And the three הָרָאשִׁ֥ים <WH7218> companies בַּשּֽׁוֹפָרוֹת֮ <WH7782> the trumpets וַיִּשְׁבְּר֣וּ <WH7665> and brake הַכַּדִּים֒ <WH3537> the pitchers וַיַּחֲזִ֤יקוּ <WH2388> and held בְיַד־ <WH3027> hands שְׂמאוֹלָם֙ <WH8040> in their left בַּלַּפִּדִ֔ים <WH3940> the lamps וּבְיַ֨ד־ <WH3027> hands יְמִינָ֔ם <WH3225> in their right הַשּׁוֹפָר֖וֹת <WH7782> and the trumpets לִתְק֑וֹעַ <WH8628> to blow וַֽיִּקְרְא֔וּ <WH7121> [withal] and they cried חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> The sword לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּלְגִדְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1439> and of Gideon
